name: Tic-Tac-Throw
description:
Tic-Tac-Throw

Tic-tac-toe (Noughts & crosses) with a twist and a flick of the wrist.

- Made in Unity w/ XR interaction Toolkit
- Tested on Oculus Quest 1

Music
